name: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu: Powerup & Scenarios
overview: Humanity has spread all over the Milky Way, and split into two powerful states which are having a permanent war with each other: the Galactic Empire, and the Free Planets Alliance. Two genius strategists are leading the forces of their respective states: Reinhard von Müsel for the Empire, and Yang Wenli for the Alliance. Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu: Powerup & Scenarios Includes 5 new scenarios, such as "Battle of El Facil" and "Battle of Castrop". In addition, the system has been significantly modified so that it can be played not only by the Imperial Army but also by the Alliance Army. The number of units that can be used has also doubled.
